images.description: A sharp contrast of a pillowy white poached egg atop a bed of kale salad in a white bowl.
Celebrity chef in an outdoor kitchen at a cooking competition. The chef is evaluating the cooking of a contestant. There are other people milling around in the background
A martial artist in a dobok is performing a flying side kick at a bag hanging from a tree at dusk.
Underwater photo of black smoke, a type of hydrothermal vent, emitting a plume of mineral-rich water.

Aerial view of a brightly lit city at night with dense buildings and long streets.  The shot just before dawn or after dusk as the sky is above is partly cloudy in gray/blue hues with pink off towards the horizon.
A man in a red shirt and helmet is joyfully zip-lining against a backdrop of trees and sky.

Ingredients, measuring cup and a bowl sitting on a green and speckled kitchen counter.  In front of them is a cookbook, laying open to what appears to be a recipe with a picture of a pie, suggesting preparation for baking.
A black and white duck with a distinctive yellow eye standing on grass.
A black and white duck with a distinctive yellow eye standing on grass.

A cable car moves uphill toward the photographer in San Francisco with Alcatraz Island in the background on a clear day.  There's a small marina at the bottom of the hill with several boats sailing near the island.
A pair of brown, plush-lined boots is shown from the calf down on a gravelly surface.
Katy Perry, with pastel-colored hair, is singing into a microphone, wearing a sparkly, multicolored outfit with a cape.
Katy Perry, with pastel-colored hair, is singing into a microphone, wearing a sparkly, multicolored outfit with a cape.
